add_alt_text_for_the_image_48cd88aa.message: Add alt text for the image

adjacent_links_with_the_same_url_should_.message: Adjacent links with the same URL should be a single link.

alt_attribute_text_should_not_contain_mo.message: Alt attribute text should not contain more than 120 characters.

heading_levels_should_not_be_skipped_394.message: Heading levels should not be skipped.

headings_should_not_contain_more_than_12.message: Headings should not contain more than 120 characters.

image_filenames_should_not_be_used_as_th.message: Image filenames should not be used as the alt attribute describing the image content.

images_should_include_an_alt_attribute_d.message: Images should include an alt attribute describing the image content.

keyboards_navigate_to_links_using_the_ta.message: Keyboards navigate to links using the Tab key. Two adjacent links that direct to the same destination can be confusing to keyboard users.

link_with_text_starting_with_start_b3fcb.message: Link with text starting with { start }

lists_should_be_formatted_as_lists_f862d.message: Lists should be formatted as lists.

screen_readers_cannot_determine_what_is_.message: Screen readers cannot determine what is displayed in an image without alternative text, and filenames are often meaningless strings of numbers and letters that do not describe the context or meaning.
Screen readers cannot determine what is displayed in an image without alternative text which describes the content and meaning of the image. Alternative text should be simple and concise.
Screen readers cannot determine what is displayed in an image without alternative text that describes the content and meaning of the image.

screen_readers_cannot_interpret_tables_w.message: Screen readers cannot interpret tables without the proper structure. Table headers provide direction and content scope.
Screen readers cannot interpret tables without the proper structure. Table captions describe the context and general understanding of the table.
Screen readers cannot interpret tables without the proper structure. Table headers provide direction and overview of the content.

sighted_users_browse_web_pages_quickly_l.message: Sighted users browse web pages quickly, looking for large or bolded headings. Screen reader users rely on headers for contextual understanding. Headers should use the proper structure.
Sighted users browse web pages quickly, looking for large or bolded headings. Screen reader users rely on headers for contextual understanding. Headers should be concise within the proper structure.

tables_should_include_a_caption_describi.message: Tables should include a caption describing the contents of the table.

tables_should_include_at_least_one_heade.message: Tables should include at least one header.

text_larger_than_18pt_or_bold_14pt_shoul.message: Text larger than 18pt (or bold 14pt) should display a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

text_smaller_than_18pt_or_bold_14pt_shou.message: Text smaller than 18pt (or bold 14pt) should display a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

when_markup_is_used_that_visually_format.message: When markup is used that visually formats items as a list but does not indicate the list relationship, users may have difficulty in navigating the information.
